tisCardPack:OffensiveTactics.NAME: Offensive Tactics
tisCardPack:OffensiveTactics.DESCRIPTION: Remove Block from ALL players. Deal damage equal to !M! times the Block removed.

tisCardPack:RelayBaton.NAME: Relay Baton
tisCardPack:RelayBaton.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Each time this card is traded, gain !M! damage.
tisCardPack:RelayBaton.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Each time this card is traded, gain !M! damage.

tisCardPack:QuickJabs.NAME: Quick Jabs
tisCardPack:QuickJabs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times to all enemies. Apply 1 taunt per hit. Gain !B! Block per each enemy hit.

tisCardPack:BloodPact.NAME: Blood Pact
tisCardPack:BloodPact.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP, heal all allies by 1 HP.

tisCardPack:Reinforce.NAME: Reinforce
tisCardPack:Reinforce.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! tiscardpack:Taunt. ALL allies lose their Block. Gain Block equal to that amount.

tisCardPack:ControlledFlame.NAME: Controlled Flame
tisCardPack:ControlledFlame.DESCRIPTION: ALL allies tiscardpack:Transfer up to !M! chosen cards from their hand, and receive a random card for each card they tiscardpack:Transferred. The cards are Exhausted upon tiscardpack:Transferring.

tisCardPack:ExtendingGrasp.NAME: Extending Grasp
tisCardPack:ExtendingGrasp.DESCRIPTION: Select 1 card from ANY ally Exhaust pile. tiscardpack:Transfer it to your Hand. tiscardpack:Transfer this card to the player and Exhaust it.

tisCardPack:Protection.NAME: Protection
tisCardPack:Protection.DESCRIPTION: Give !B! Block to a random ally.
tisCardPack:Protection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Give !B! Block to a selected ally.

tisCardPack:SwiftBlow.NAME: Swift Blow
tisCardPack:SwiftBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If played by a class other than an Ironclad, also apply !M! Vulnerable.

tisCardPack:StrengthFromPain.NAME: Strength from Pain
tisCardPack:StrengthFromPain.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. ALL allies gain Strength equal to HP lost. Exhaust.

tisCardPack:Boomerang.NAME: Boomerang
tisCardPack:Boomerang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase this card's damage for !M! this turn and tiscardpack:Transfer it to a random player.

tisCardPack:SmokeBomb.NAME: Evasive Dust
tisCardPack:SmokeBomb.DESCRIPTION: Give ALL allies !M! Dexterity for this turn.

tisCardPack:GroupPlans.NAME: Group Plans
tisCardPack:GroupPlans.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, ALL allies gain [G] and draw !M! card.
tisCardPack:GroupPlans.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, ALL allies gain [G] [G] and draw !M! cards.

tisCardPack:Neurotoxin.NAME: Neurotoxin
tisCardPack:Neurotoxin.DESCRIPTION: Give EVERYONE block equal to the divided amount of enemy poison.

tisCardPack:Bombard.NAME: Bombard
tisCardPack:Bombard.DESCRIPTION: ALL allies discard their hand. Allies deal !M! damage for each card discarded.

tisCardPack:GoldenShiv.NAME: Golden Shiv
tisCardPack:GoldenShiv.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. !M!% chance to Exhaust. Otherwise, increase the chance to Exhaust by 10% and tiscardpack:Transfer it to a random Ally.
tisCardPack:GoldenShiv.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. !M!% chance to Exhaust. Otherwise, increase the chance to Exhaust by 5% and tiscardpack:Transfer it to a random Ally.

tisCardPack:Copycat.NAME: Copycat
tisCardPack:Copycat.DESCRIPTION: Copy the next ally played card. Exhaust.
tisCardPack:Copycat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Copy the next !M! ally played cards. Exhaust.

tisCardPack:SplashPotion.NAME: Splash Potion
tisCardPack:SplashPotion.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies and 3 Poison to ALL allies and yourself.

tisCardPack:Antidote.NAME: Antidote
tisCardPack:Antidote.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL Poison from ALL allies and heal them for the same amount. Exhaust.
tisCardPack:Antidote.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL Poison from ALL allies and heal them for the same amount. Retain. Exhaust.

tisCardPack:SelectDraw.NAME: Select Draw
tisCardPack:SelectDraw.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an ally manually discards a card, draw a card.

tisCardPack:Scrapper.NAME: Scrapper
tisCardPack:Scrapper.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an ally manually discards a card, gain 1 *Shiv.
tisCardPack:Scrapper.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever an ally manually discards a card, gain 1 *Shiv *+.

tisCardPack:CausticDagger.NAME: Caustic Dagger
tisCardPack:CausticDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If played by a class other than The Silent, also apply !M! Poison.

tisCardPack:Cryogenetics.NAME: Cryogenics
tisCardPack:Cryogenetics.DESCRIPTION: Frost orbs now also apply block to all teammates. Channel !M! Frost.

tisCardPack:Replicate.NAME: Replicate
tisCardPack:Replicate.DESCRIPTION: Next skill you play this turn will play for each ally in the room as well.
tisCardPack:Replicate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next !M! skills you play this turn will play for each ally in the room as well.

tisCardPack:TimeBomb.NAME: Time Bomb
tisCardPack:TimeBomb.DESCRIPTION: tiscardpack:Construct 1 Dark Orb at the selected ally. Place a *Detonate in a teammate's discard pile. Exhaust.

tisCardPack:Detonate.NAME: Detonate
tisCardPack:Detonate.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all your Dark orbs. Exhaust.

tisCardPack:SpareBattery.NAME: Spare Battery
tisCardPack:SpareBattery.DESCRIPTION: tiscardpack:Construct !M! Plasma at the selected ally.

tisCardPack:DrainSystems.NAME: Drain Systems
tisCardPack:DrainSystems.DESCRIPTION: All allies lose 1 [E]. Channel Lightning equal to !M! times the consumed [E] .

tisCardPack:Stasis.NAME: Stasis
tisCardPack:Stasis.DESCRIPTION: ALL allies can't take damage or play cards this turn. Exhaust.

tisCardPack:FaultySensors.NAME: Faulty Sensors
tisCardPack:FaultySensors.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the Strength of ALL enemies by !M! and ALL allies by 1. Exhaust

tisCardPack:Purify.NAME: Purify
tisCardPack:Purify.DESCRIPTION: Convert ALL current and future Dark orbs into Purified Dark orbs.

tisCardPack:Clawed.NAME: Clawed
tisCardPack:Clawed.DESCRIPTION: Each ally played Claw counts towards your Claw damage as well.
tisCardPack:Clawed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 3 Claws randomly to your ally draw piles.

tisCardPack:PrototypeExperiment.NAME: Prototype Experiment
tisCardPack:PrototypeExperiment.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If played by a class other than a Defect, gain !M! Focus and channel a random Orb.

tisCardPack:RepairMechanism.NAME: Repair Mechanism
tisCardPack:RepairMechanism.DESCRIPTION: At end of combat, ALL allies heal !M! HP.

tisCardPack:CoreDuplicate.NAME: Core Duplicate
tisCardPack:CoreDuplicate.DESCRIPTION: Select any Ally power card and add a copy of it to your hand. Exhaust.
tisCardPack:CoreDuplicate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Select any Ally power card and add a 0-cost copy of it to your hand. Exhaust.

tisCardPack:Virulence.NAME: Act of Destruction
tisCardPack:Virulence.DESCRIPTION: Make ALL allies go into Wrath.

tisCardPack:Nerveless.NAME: Act of Creation
tisCardPack:Nerveless.DESCRIPTION: Make ALL allies go into Calm.

tisCardPack:BlindFaith.NAME: Blind Faith
tisCardPack:BlindFaith.DESCRIPTION: Put ALL allies into Divinity until the end of the turn. Put a *Broken *Faith in ALL allies hand. Exhaust.
tisCardPack:BlindFaith.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put ALL allies into Divinity until the end of the turn. Put a *Broken *Faith in ALL allies draw pile. Exhaust.

tisCardPack:DivineResurrection.NAME: Divine Resurrection
tisCardPack:DivineResurrection.DESCRIPTION: Revive ALL dead allies in the room to 1 HP. Apply tiscardpack:Doomed and tiscardpack:Spirit_Bind to them.
tisCardPack:DivineResurrection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Revive ALL dead allies in the room to 1 HP. Apply tiscardpack:Doomed, tiscardpack:Spirit_Bind, and Buffer to them.

tisCardPack:Cleanse.NAME: Cleanse
tisCardPack:Cleanse.DESCRIPTION: Remove tiscardpack:Insanity from ALL allies and gain Mantra equal to the removed amount. Give ALL allies 1 Artifact if you enter Divinity. Exhaust.
tisCardPack:Cleanse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove tiscardpack:Insanity from ALL allies and gain Mantra equal to the removed amount. Give ALL allies 1 Artifact if you enter Divinity.

tisCardPack:Sanctify.NAME: Sanctify
tisCardPack:Sanctify.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Mantra, ALL allies gain 1 Mantra. Does not stack.

tisCardPack:SacredGrounds.NAME: Sacred Ground
tisCardPack:SacredGrounds.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an ally gains tiscardpack:Insanity, gain 1 [E].

tisCardPack:Mania.NAME: Mania
tisCardPack:Mania.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an ally takes unblocked damage, they gain 1 Strength and 1 tiscardpack:Insanity.

tisCardPack:Recite.NAME: Recite
tisCardPack:Recite.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Mantra. ALL allies gain 1 tiscardpack:Insanity.

tisCardPack:MassHysteria.NAME: Mass Hysteria
tisCardPack:MassHysteria.DESCRIPTION: ALL Allies enter Wrath, gain 10 tiscardpack:Insanity, discard ALL their non Attack cards.
tisCardPack:MassHysteria.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL Allies enter Wrath, gain 10 tiscardpack:Insanity, discard ALL their non Attack cards, and gain 2 [E].

tisCardPack:BrokenStature.NAME: Broken Stature
tisCardPack:BrokenStature.DESCRIPTION: Add *Weak *Point to the draw pile of ALL allies.
tisCardPack:BrokenStature.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add *Weak *Point *+ to the draw pile of ALL allies.

tisCardPack:WeakPoint.NAME: Weak Point
tisCardPack:WeakPoint.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Mark to an enemy. ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark.
tisCardPack:WeakPoint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Marks to an enemy. ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark.

tisCardPack:Conviction.NAME: Conviction
tisCardPack:Conviction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If played by a class other than the Watcher, gain !M! Mantra.

tisCardPack:GroupCharge.NAME: Group Charge
tisCardPack:GroupCharge.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 1 *Full *Charge into the draw pile of all players in the room. Exhaust.

tisCardPack:BlankCard.NAME: Blank Card
tisCardPack:BlankCard.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a copy of a random highest rarity card from the deck of ALL your allies. Play it and Exhaust it after. Exhaust.
tisCardPack:BlankCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Obtain a copy of a random highest rarity card from the deck of ALL your allies and upgrade it. Play it and Exhaust it after. Exhaust.

tisCardPack:TouchOfTheSpire.NAME: Touch of the Spire
tisCardPack:TouchOfTheSpire.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card gain 1 tiscardpack:Insanity. Unplayable.

tisCardPack:BrokenFaith.NAME: Broken Faith
tisCardPack:BrokenFaith.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card with this card in hand gain 1 tiscardpack:Insanity. Unplayable.

tisCardPack:Infection.NAME: Infection
tisCardPack:Infection.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card, put a copy of it in a random player's discard pile. Unplayable.

tisCardPack:OldMaid.NAME: Hot Potato
tisCardPack:OldMaid.DESCRIPTION: When Discarded, permanently tiscardpack:Transfer this card to a random player. If you end the combat with this curse in your deck lose 5 HP. Unplayable.

tisCardPack:Distrust.NAME: Distrust
tisCardPack:Distrust.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw this card a random ally gains 1 Frail and 1 Weak. Unplayable.
